nodes.text: Sikes was a Human male who was a Rebel Elite Commando. He accompanied Leia, Chewbacca, Han Solo, and Luke Skywalker to Kiva on a mission to stop Project Starscream.

On a mission to Kiva, he was in charge of babysitting Zak Arranda, Tash Arranda and the baby Eppon, alongside his elite partners. After the mysterious death of all his comrades he was the last of the elite team in charge defend the Rebel leaders on a mission on Kiva. When he was caring for the baby Eppon, he disappeared too, killed by Eppon.
